title: The oracles of reason ... in several letters to Mr. Hobbs and other persons of eminent quality and learning / by Char. Blount, Esq., Mr. Gildon and others.
author: Blount, Charles, 1654-1693.
notes: Preface signed: C. Gildon [i.e. Charles Gildon].
The 7th and 8th chapters of Burnet's Archaeologia and Appendix of the Brachmin's religion, were translated by H.B. [i.e Henry Brown] Cf. p. 20.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
